statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); branch=$(cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && git branch --show-current 2>/dev/null); model=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.model.display_name'); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then printf "\033[35m%s\033[0m \033[34m%s\033[32m(%s)\033[00m" "$model" "$cwd" "$branch"; else printf "\033[35m%s\033[0m \033[34m%s\033[00m" "$model" "$cwd"; fi
